title: Sharing The Secret [2000] Alison Lohman
description:
Alison Lohman: 

# Drag Me to Hell (2009) 
# Game (2009)
# Beowulf (2007) 
# Things We Lost in the Fire (2007) 
# Flicka (2006) 
# Delirious (2006) 
# Where the Truth Lies (2005) 
# The Big White (2005)
# Big Fish (2003)
# Matchstick Men (2003)
# White Oleander (2002) 
# "Pasadena" (2001-2002)
# White Boy (2002) 
# Alex in Wonder (2001) 
# Delivering Milo (2001) 
# Tucker (2000)
# Sharing the Secret (2000) (TV)
# The Million Dollar Kid (2000)
# "Safe Harbor" (1999) 
# Planet Patrol (1999)
# The Auteur Theory (1999)
# "Crusade" (1 episode, 1999)
# The Thirteenth Floor (1999)
# "7th Heaven" (1 episode, 1998)
# "Pacific Blue" (1 episode, 1998)
# Kraa! The Sea Monster (1998)

In one of Alison's best performances ever. 

Beth, a jr. high school girl, the perfect daughter, has to admit to herself and to her friends and to her broken family that she's not perfect and has a deep dark secret.  Bulimia.

The sound is awesome, the vid a little blocky. Just sit a bit further back than usual.  This is a must see performance. I had to convert flv files to avi.

Remember she was 20 in this role of a 14 year old.  Stunning actress.

(10) avi files
